CardData.FlavorText: <line-height=100%><size=200%>T</size>he odds appear grim as enemies continue to harass you. Yet you have persevered through great oddsâ€”swarms of spiders, hordes of orcs, and a forest rife with threats. Though you are surrounded by danger aplenty, your courage remains strong. With a fierce cry, you rally your companions to engage your foes with renewed vigor.

Localization.Title: Inspiring Courage
Localization.Text: Choose: ; ; or . Every Hero in play gains +2 to that ability on this Quest
